title: Corrigendum to ‘Synthesis, structure, photophysical and electrochemical properties of Ru(TFA)(CO)(PPh3)2(L) (L=2-phenylpyridine, 2-p-tolylpyridine) and Ru(CO)(PPhMe2)2(L)(L′) (L= TFA, H) (L′= bipyridine, L′= 4,4′-dimethylbipyridine) relationships between ancillary ligand structure and luminescent properties’ [J. Organomet. Chem. 849–850 (2017) 306–314]
